MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Drumaird Farm and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:40am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty in locating the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:08 AM on Monday, 29 March 2021.
